body.raw:
{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version=\"1.0\" output-format=\"xml-platform\" mapping=\"logical\" distinct=\"false\"><entity name=\"contact\"><attribute name=\"fullname\"/><attribute name=\"telephone1\"/><attribute name=\"contactid\"/><order attribute=\"fullname\" descending=\"false\"/><filter type=\"and\"><condition attribute=\"firstname\" operator=\"like\" value=\"%LoadbasedRoundRobin%\"/><condition attribute=\"createdon\" operator=\"today\"/></filter></entity></fetch>",
   "cmc_baseentity":"contact",
   "cmc_FallBackUserId@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{gFallbackuser}})",
   "cmc_assigntofield":"ownerid",
   "cmc_name":"Loadbasedassignment{{$randomInt}}",
   "statecode":0,
   "statuscode": 175490000,
   "cmc_baseentityname": "Contact"

}

{
    "cmc_fetchxml": "<fetch version=\"1.0\" output-format=\"xml-platform\" mapping=\"logical\" distinct=\"false\"><entity name=\"contact\"><attribute name=\"contactid\"/><attribute name=\"createdon\"/><order attribute=\"createdon\" descending=\"false\"/><filter type=\"and\"><condition attribute=\"cmc_recentact\" operator=\"gt\" value=\"400\"/><condition attribute=\"cmc_domstatus\" operator=\"eq\" value=\"175490000\"/></filter></entity></fetch>",
    "cmc_userloadfetchxml": "<fetch version=\"1.0\" output-format=\"xml-platform\" mapping=\"logical\" distinct=\"false\"><entity name=\"contact\"><attribute name=\"contactid\"/><attribute name=\"createdon\"/><order attribute=\"createdon\" descending=\"false\"/><filter type=\"and\"><condition attribute=\"firstname\" operator=\"like\" value=\"LoadbasedRoundRobin{{globalsessionvalue}}%\"/></filter></entity></fetch>",
    "cmc_executionorder": 1,
    "cmc_assignmenttype": 175490003,
    "cmc_name": "Loadbasedassignment{{$randomInt}}",
    "cmc_userlistid@odata.bind": "/cmc_userlists({{guserlistid}})",    
    "cmc_baseentity": "contact",
    "cmc_AssignmentGroupId@odata.bind": "/cmc_assignmentgroups({{gassignmentgroupid}})"
}
